sen.j: 伸子（籡、しんし）は、和服の洗い張り（洗濯）や反物を染色する際に、用布の両長辺にその両端を刺して弓 (武器)形に張りわたし、布を縮ませず、幅を保たせるように支えるための道具。
sen.e: Shinshi is a tool to be used in Arai-hari of Wafuku (Japanese traditional clothes) (a Kimono-cleaning technique to lay or stretch out a starched Kimono to dry) or dyeing fabrics by sticking each of its ends into a longer edge of the fabric, respectively, to stretch out the fabric in the shape of a bow (a type of weapon) so as to support it while keeping its width without shrinkage.
